header.paragraph: At Netneo, we combine design, development, and artificial intelligence to create unique digital experiences. Websites, apps, and ideas that work, look great, and represent your brand. Nothing standardâ€”everything tailored to you.

services.title3: What we do for you. We transform <pink>ideas</pink> into <blue>digital</blue> solutions

servicesList.label: Apps
servicesList.title: Custom Apps
servicesList.description: Functional, fast, and tailored to your needs.

servicesList.label: Websites
servicesList.title: Smart Websites
servicesList.description: Designed to convert, optimized to stand out.

servicesList.label: SEO
servicesList.title: SEO & Strategy
servicesList.description: So they can find you, choose you, and remember you.

reasons.paragraph: At Netneo we don't do the usual. We design original solutions, without templates, without rush, without smoke. We listen to you, create with you, and we're there afterwards. That's how we work, that's how we stand out.

reasonList.label: custom-made
reasonList.description: Each project starts from scratch. No recycled templates or generic systems: only unique ideas that reflect your essence and your brand.

reasonList.label: human
reasonList.description: The treatment is direct, close, and professional. We talk with you, listen, and propose. We work as people, not as robots.

reasonList.label: original
reasonList.description: No gray websites or soulless clones. We design visual experiences that stand out, connect, and make you memorable.

reasonList.label: commitment
reasonList.description: Your investment has a return. Our prices reflect value, not just hours. What we deliver, we stand behind.

reasonList.label: support
reasonList.description: After the launch, we continue with you. We take care of your website or app so that it works, evolves, and never gives you headaches.

projectsList.title: by Carla Herrero
projectsList.description: Website for a brand specializing in branding, social media, and web design. It showcases her services and projects with a visual, dynamic, and easy-to-update design.
projectsList.imgAlt: Mobile screenshot of the website 'by Carla Herrero'

projectsList.title: RDA Padel Academy
projectsList.description: Digital project that gives visibility to the brand's philosophy, teams, and events with a solid and modern image, including sections editable by the client.
projectsList.imgAlt: Tablet screenshot of the website 'RDA Padel Academy'

projectsList.title: El Whoper
projectsList.description: El Whoper is a website with a unique and 100% original style. Designed for an illustrator and designer, it reflects his creative and professional essence. Its goal: to showcase his services visually and attract new clients.
projectsList.imgAlt: Desktop screenshot of the website 'El Whoper'

projectsList.title: Student's MG
projectsList.description: An app that allows our client to easily organize and control student payments by quarters. It securely stores information and generates ready-to-print invoices every three months. A practical and simple tool to always keep records in order.
projectsList.imgAlt: Desktop screenshot of the app 'Student's MG'
